channel.title: Mattew Lawrence on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Mattew Lawrence on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Matthew Lawrence’s Questioning of the ‘Superman’ Dog-Superhero Bond Sparks Debate
item.description: The actor took issue with the portrayal of the titular hero and feisty pooch’s dynamic in this summer’s box-office smash hit.
